structure.unit: STATE LIBRARIES -- LIBRARIANS -- STATE ARCHIVES AND RECORDS

text.section: There is created the Commonwealth of Kentucky War of 1812 Bicentennial Commission, which shall be attached to the Kentucky Historical Society for administrative purposes.
The chair of the commission shall be elected by the members of the commission.
The first meeting of the commission shall be held no later than July 31, 2010.
The commission may create an advisory board of persons with a demonstrated interest in various aspects of the War of 1812.
Members of the commission shall serve without compensation.
The Commonwealth of Kentucky War of 1812 Bicentennial Commission shall expire on January 31, 2015.

law.history: Amended 2015 Ky. Acts ch. 69, sec. 10, effective June 24, 2015. -- Created 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 68, sec. 1, effective July 15, 2010.
